item.title: Financial Analysis of SEC Reports in R
item.description: The Package: finreport The key tool to facilitate the financial analysis of companies that file regular SEC reports of certain forms is finreportr. To make use of it, we must first have R install it and dependencies. To install it, install.packages("finreportr", dependencies=TRUE). The Commands The first command is CompanyInfo(). library(finreportr) CompanyInfo("JPM") ## company CIK SIC state state.inc FY.end street.address ## 1 JPMORGAN CHASE & CO 0000019617 6021 NY DE 1231 383 MADISON AVENUE ## city.
